item.title: World of Goo 2
item.description:
Title: World of Goo 2
Genre: Adventure , Casual , Indie
Developer: 2D BOY , Tomorrow Corporation
Publisher: 2D BOY , Tomorrow Corporation
Release Date: Apr 25, 2025




About This Game

Build bridges, grow towers, terraform terrain, and fuel flying machines in the stunning followup to the multi-award winning World of Goo.

Discover realistic flowing, splashing, viscous liquid. Route the flow of liquid like a river, convert it into Goo Balls, extinguish fires, and solve puzzles.

WHAT STRANGE NEW CREATURES!
Discover new species of Goo: Jelly Goo, Liquid Launchers, Growing Goo, Shrinking Goo, Explosive Goo, and more. All with mysterious new properties.


IT SOUNDS LIKE‚Ä¶
World of Goo 2 has dozens of new musical tracks in a beautiful and haunting new soundtrack.

WELCOME TO‚Ä¶
A thrilling new story to explore over the course of 5 new chapters, bursting with over 60 new levels, each featuring additional challenges.

YOU ARE NOT ALONE...
A powerful company has re-branded as an environmentally friendly, sustainable, green, clean, Goo processing non-profit.Help them collect as much Goo as possible. But what do they really want? Explore a new story spanning hundreds of thousands of years and watch the world change.

LET‚ÄôS SEE WHAT HAPPENS THIS TIME.
Be careful! The world is beautiful, but it is dangerous. Guide as many Goo Balls into the exit pipe of each area as you can. ...but what's on the other end of the pipe?

item.title: Monster Prom 4: Monster Con
item.description:
Title: Monster Prom 4: Monster Con
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: Beautiful Glitch
Publisher: Beautiful Glitch
Franchise: Monster Prom , Monster Camp , Monster Roadtrip , Monster Con
Release Date: Apr 24, 2025




About This Game



GET READY FOR THE MONSTER CON!

"Monster Prom 4: Monster Con" goes back to the classic dating sim formula from the beloved Monster Prom franchise: you have limited time to find a date among six sexy monsters!
This sequel brings you into a wacky new setting: the Monster Con, a massive convention filled with video games, comic books, anime‚Ä¶ and more than a few paranormal activities.
You can expect a multiplayer narrative adventure full of colorful characters and hilarious dialogue!

Explore the Con and fulfill your nerdiest fantasies! Get to know the Con‚Äôs crazy staff and visitors: annoying streamers, famous authors, washed-up actors, networking game developers‚Ä¶ and so many more! Hang out with your old friends Zoe and Liam, and meet four brand new characters who might win your heart by the end of the Con!

Grab up to three friends or play by yourself. Enjoy the beautiful art and the witty dialogue. Unleash your inner nerd and make the right choices to find a date at the craziest monster-filled convention you'll ever visit!

What can you expect to find at the Monster Con?
  • The signature style of the Monster Prom franchise: unique, charming characters and irreverent humor
  • New mechanics! During the Con, you‚Äôll get a chance to build your own comic book that you'll get to see by the end of the run.
  • Intimate conversations to get to know your favorite characters.
  • TONS of beautiful art!
  • You can play with friends via local and online multiplayer!
  • Compete for the heart of a character! If you share your romantic tastes with your friends, be ready for some stiff competition.
  • There's a sexy clown. Honk!





Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Use of mature language in a humorous way.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows 8 or higher
    • Processor: Anything from the last 5 years
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

MacOS

    Minimum:
    • OS: OS X
    • Processor: Anything from the last 5 years
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Storage: 2 GB available space

Linux

    Minimum:
    • OS: Ubuntu or anything that makes sense
    • Processor: Anything from the last 5 years
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Storage: 2 GB available space

item.title: GeckoShop
item.description:
Title: GeckoShop
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation , Early Access
Developer: Reptoid
Publisher: Reptoid
Release Date: Apr 24, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Apr 24, 2025




About This Game

Everything about GeckoShop:

GeckoShop is a Sandbox Shop Simulator + Creature Collector , where you manage your own shop, selling all the different varieties of geckos!

"Your dream of having your own Petshop finally comes true. Get cozy and have a fun time collecting and selling lizards, or grind hard and be the next millionare on this island!"

You'll have to:

  • Deal with customers , set your own Prices.

  • Keep the store clean and working, or get Employees to do it for you!

  • Explore the small open-world city , with People to interact with, Quests and other things at every corner.

  • Find Shells and ancient Artifacts on the beach to fill the museum , to unlock even more content as you go.

  • Accept Quests from various NPCs on the island.

  • Catch Thieves trying to steal from your shop.

  • Decorate and upgrade your store, however you want.

Collect a big variety of different types and rarities of Lizards.

You can sell your pets, or turn your Shop into a zoo!

There are hundreds of geckos for you to unlock, in 4 rarities. Through opening chests, mutating geckos in the Lab, Vending machines, and through sidequests.

Buy and open different Boxes , to get random Geckos from that set, and if you're lucky enough you might even find a Super rare gecko.

Upgrade, Decorate and Paint your Shop, however you feel like.

Hire Employees to assist you to sell pets and products, clean trash from your store, and catch thieves before they can steal anything.

Keep your shop small or upgrade it to the maximum, make a giant warehouse full of rare items and animals.

Collect Trophies to display in the Backroom of your Shop, to keep track of your Progress.

Explore the City, Mutate Geckos, Eat burgers, Repeat.

The City is full of Surprises ! Check out the Lab , where "Zippy Joe" made a machine to mutate 5 geckos into another one, and with some luck you might even get a Lab-exclusive gecko (very rare, they sparke in rainbow colors!)

Go to the Wrenchshop , and talk with "Bolt" about upgrading your shop, or go to the Paintshop and let "Doodle" paint your whole Shop.

Get yourself a Companion from the Petshop , or race against other geckos!

And dont forget to get a Burger from the restaurant next to the Beach ;)

Sidequests everywhere!

You might want to go treasure hunting, or collect shells and ancient artifacts to keep the museum growing.

Or maybe you want to catch fishes all day long and forget about your customers!
Sell your fishes to "Skipper", but don't worry, you'll see in your Collection which fishes you've already catched, and which ones are missing.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(We are also working on adding Multiple Languages, Full Controller Support, Steam Achievements etc. as soon as possible.)

System Requirements

Windows

Linux

item.title: SpellRogue
item.description:
Title: SpellRogue
Genre: Indie , Strategy
Developer: Guidelight Games
Publisher: Ghost Ship Publishing
Release Date: Apr 24, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Feb 12, 2024




About This Game

Dice Gameplay

Master the art of dice manipulation and wield powerful spells in SpellRogue , a turn-based deckbuilding roguelike where every roll shapes your fate. Control the fickle Mana Dice by rerolling, duplicating, splitting, flipping, and enchanting them with special effects. Bend luck to your will and unleash devastating magic!

Deep Tactical Combat

Engage in battles with enemies directly disrupting your spells and dice :

üçÑ Twisted mushrooms infect your spells with spreading debuffs.

üî• Fiery elementals ignite your spells, making them dangerous to cast.

üíÄ Cursed Voidbringers doom your Dice to roll poorly and destabilizes spells.

Adapt, strategize, and turn the tide in your favor!

A World Consumed by the Void

The Voidbringers have unleashed meteors of corruption, warping your once-peaceful world into a land of ravenous horrors. Journey through the Deadwoods, Scorched Desert, and beyond , track the source of this arcane blight, and purge the creeping darkness before it consumes everything.

Dice Slingers & Magic

Meet the Dice Slingers , each wielding a unique elemental mastery and distinct ways to manipulate and control their Mana Dice.

  • Azar the Cinder Conjurer : Fueling the flames with his burning blood, he ignites small embers into raging infernos, unleashing devastating fire upon his foes.

  • Hazel the Earthen Mage : Shaping the flow of life, she grows Mana Dice to incredible strength or withers foes to dust. The very earth bends to her will, rising to bolster her power.

  • Lapis the Azure Seer : A master of the tides, he commands the currents of Mana Dice, conjuring unyielding defenses, drowning foes in poison, and calling forth crashing waves of raw power.

  • Sefyra the Windcaller: Wielding the wrath of a storm, she weaves the winds to align her spells in perfect harmony, and summons lightning to smite her enemies (Coming in 1.0).

A Grand Adventure with Elegant Complexity

  • ‚ú® 350+ spells , each with two upgrades and unique animations and art.

  • ‚öîÔ∏è 75+ enemies , each with unique abilities to challenge your strategy.

  • üí∞145+ artifacts to shape and refine your build.

  • üé≤ Prove your mastery by boosting the difficulty with the Descent system.

  • üèÜ Take on Daily Challenges with ever-changing twists.

  • üèπ Battle through 3 acts to confront the Voidbringers , and uncover the truth!

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10/11
    • Processor: 3 Ghz
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950
    • Storage: 2 GB available space

item.title: BOKURA: planet
item.description:
Title: BOKURA: planet
Genre: Action , Adventure , Casual , Indie
Developer: „Å®„Åì„Çç„Å´„Çá„Çä
Publisher: Kodansha
Franchise: Kodansha
Release Date: Apr 24, 2025




About This Game

Note:

Players must communicate with each other to play this game. If you are not playing in the same location, you will need another communication method, such as voice chat. Before buying the game, please keep in mind that the game itself does not provide a separate communication method.

BOKURA: planet is a puzzle adventure game that must be played with two players, who communicate and work together to solve puzzles. It takes place in a different setting than BOKURA and has a whole new story, with different actions and gimmicks.

Same but Different: A game system like the previous game, but it plays completely differently

BOKURA: planet requires two players on two different machines to communicate while playing.

Players need to share what they see on their own screens and cooperate to solve puzzles and progress through the stages, just like in BOKURA , but there is a new action: Push. You can now send the other player flying with the push of a button.

Sometimes you might get in the other player's way, or maybe even push them off a cliff... Cooperating isn't everything in this game.

The estimated playing time is approximately 3 hours.

The new action: Push! Careful where you use it, because you don't know what might happen...

Story

After Earth fell to ruin, the few remaining survivors had to rebuild civilization from the Stone Age. When they finally advanced to the age of space exploration, they decided to explore the far reaches of space, but the distance meant it would take them hundreds of years to arrive. For this expedition, humankind decided to send condemned convicts.

On the way to an unknown red planet, the expedition's spaceship breaks down, forcing two members of the crew to make a crash landing. They both have their own reasons for needing to return to Earth no matter what, but will they be able to make it back alive?

Work together to solve puzzles and escape from the unknown red planet!

Hidden Objective Co-op Adventure

As you proceed through the stages, each player will be presented with a hidden objective. Each player will only know their own objective, which will be hidden to the other player. You need to cooperate with the other player on your journey, but what on Earth do they know that you don't...?

A new title from tokoronyori, creator of Hitoribocchi Wakusei (Lonely Planet) and BOKURA

tokoronyori

An indie game dev who creates unique worlds with a distinctive art style, filling his games with originality and mystery. His 2016 smartphone idle game Hitoribocchi Wakusei (Lonely Planet) was a huge hit on social media. He created the exclusively two-player puzzle adventure game BOKURA in 2023 as a member of the first round of Kodansha Game Creator's Lab. He specializes in making experiences only possible through games with his characteristic game mechanics.

[Creator Comment]

The idea for this game comes from something I thought up while planning BOKURA . I could have gone a completely different direction when making BOKURA , but for various reasons, BOKURA ended up the way it did.

While I am proud of the decisions that led to BOKURA , at the same time, I kept wondering what scenery I might have seen if I'd gone in the complete opposite direction. In the end, I couldn't hold back. I ran the other way, which is how BOKURA: planet was born, and the view here is incredible.

Descrierea con»õinutului pentru adul»õi indisponibilƒÉ.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i5
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM

MacOS

    Minimum:
    • OS: macOS 10.15 Catalina
    • Processor: Intel Core i5
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
* Starting February 15, 2024, the Steam Client will no longer support 32-bit games or macOS 10.14 or lower.
